scripts.setup:check: echo 'Checking dependencies...' && pnpm --version && docker --version && docker compose version && (forge --version || echo 'Foundry not installed. Run: pnpm setup:foundry')
scripts.db:init: pnpm setup:check && mkdir -p tb_data && docker run --rm --security-opt seccomp=unconfined -v $(pwd)/tb_data:/data ghcr.io/tigerbeetle/tigerbeetle:latest format --cluster=0 --replica=0 --replica-count=1 /data/0_0.tigerbeetle
scripts.dev:reset: rm -rf .cache apps/*/.cache node_modules apps/*/node_modules packages/*/node_modules pnpm-lock.yaml .turbo apps/*/.turbo apps/*/.next apps/*/next-env.d.ts && pnpm install
